name: Shelf-like
description:
What is Shelf-like?

Shelf-like is a no-pressure game of organizing a bunch of items on a shelf. No scores, wins, or game overs. How you play is up to you. (You can also *not* organize them and let chaos reign!)

This game was started during The Great Chaos Jam. I wanted to make a small game that gives you a sense of satisfaction, while letting you define when the game is "done".

I hope you have fun poking around and let me know your thoughts. :)

Future plans for the game include:
  • Adding more variety to objects
  • Creating more rooms with specific themes
  • Updating the art. The current items are drawn using Gamemaker's sprite editor, while the howto section is hand-drawn using a tablet. I plan to stick to the latter style.
  • I'll update this section as my wishlist grows!
Credits:
  • Music is called Snowfall Final by shadydave at freesound.org
  • Created using GameMaker Studio 2
